english.segment1: Verse 1: According to Your unfailing love . According to Your great compassion . Have mercy on me again
english.segment2: Verse 2. Hear the cry of my broken spirit . Restore to me the joy of my salvation . And I will rejoice, I will rejoice in You. That I may be, that I may be
english.segment3: Chorus 1: Renewed again . So the fire inside me burns . I'm so in need of love
english.segment5: Chorus 2: You know my ways . So remove the stains in me . I'm so in need of love
